doc:
Georges Poujouly https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Georges_Poujouly 0 Georges Poujouly (20 January 1940 in Garches, Hauts-de-Seine – 28 October 2000 in Villejuif, Val-de-Marne) was a French actor who gained international acclaim as a child for his performance in the award-winning film Forbidden Games. In the 1950s, he appeared in a number of other high-profile films, notably Les Diaboliques, And God Created Woman and Ascenseur pour l'échafaud. His later career was spent mainly in television, where he specialised in voiceover work. Georges_Poujouly ( 20_January_1940 in Garches , Hauts-de-Seine – 28_October_2000 in Villejuif , Val-de-Marne ) was a_French_actor who gained international_acclaim as a_child for his_performance in the_award-winning_film_Forbidden_Games . In the_1950s , he appeared in a_number of other_high-profile_films , notably Les_Diaboliques , And God_Created_Woman_and_Ascenseur pour l'échafaud . His_later_career was_spent mainly in television , where he specialised in voiceover_work .
